Hammerfall Step.name: Hammerfall Step
Hammerfall Step.flavor: You transport both enemies and allies. Your allies experience a pleasant trip to safety; your enemies end up in jeopardy.
Hammerfall Step.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and you teleport the target 3 squares.
Hammerfall Step.effect: You teleport each ally in the blast 3 squares.

Wayfarer's Evasion.name: Wayfarer's Evasion
Wayfarer's Evasion.flavor: As your foeâ€™s weapon falls upon you, you suddenly whisk away.
Wayfarer's Evasion.trigger: You are hit or missed by an attack

Terrifying Journey.name: Terrifying Journey
Terrifying Journey.flavor: You send your enemies . . . elsewhere. Somewhere terrible.
Terrifying Journey.onHit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is teleported to an interplanar space (save ends). While in the interplanar space, the target cannot take actions and cannot be targeted. On a save, it returns to the space it was last in. If that space is occupied, the target returns to the nearest unoccupied space of its choice.
Terrifying Journey.onMiss: Half damage, and the creature is dazed (save ends).
